thread.section_title: Archive News & Video for Tuesday, 27 Feb 2018 | Reuters.com
thread.title: NZ's Sky Network Television's H1 profit rises 12 pct helped by lower costs

author: Reuters Editorial
title: NZ's Sky Network Television's H1 profit rises 12 pct helped by lower costs
text:
Feb 28 (Reuters) - New Zealandâ€™s Sky Network Television on Wednesday said half-year net profit rose 12 percent, in part aided by lower costs across core operations as a result of a smaller subscriber base.
The subscription television provider posted an interim net profit of NZ$66.6 million ($48.24 million) in the six months to Dec. 31, compared with NZ$59.3 million last year.
The company announced an interim dividend of NZ$0.075, down from the NZ$0.15 payout in the previous year.
Reporting by Devika Syamnath in Bengaluru, editing by David Evans
